usefulItems: loaf tin (18 x 7 x 6 cm), baking paper, wooden skewer, wire rack, oven
title: Paleo Sandwich Bread

ingredients.content: 40 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 160°C. Grease and line a loaf tin (18 x 7 x 6 cm) with baking paper, leaving a 2 cm overhang and set aside.
Place almonds and flaxseeds (linseeds) into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add coconut flour, salt, bicarbonate of soda and baking powder and mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add all remaining ingredients and mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of bowl with spatula, then repeat mixing <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>.
Transfer mixture into prepared loaf tin and bake for 30-35 minutes (160°C), or until a wooden skewer inserted into the centre of the bread comes out clean.
Leave bread to cool in tin for 10 minutes, then using overhanging baking paper, remove bread from tin and transfer onto a wire rack to cool completely before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Wrap bread in cling film or place into a sealable storage container and store in fridge for up to 1 week.
This bread is a great everyday sandwich bread, and perfect for toasting.
Try making with your filling of choice.
